name: zulip-mobile-notifs
description: Zulip notification bridge - polls Zulip API and delivers push notifications

SUBSCRIPTIONS.description: kv namespace for storing push subscriptions and encrypted credentials

VAPID_PUBLIC_KEY.description: public key for web push. generate with: npx web-push generate-vapid-keys or at https://d3v.one/vapid-key-generator/

VAPID_PRIVATE_KEY.description: private key for web push. generate with: npx web-push generate-vapid-keys or at https://d3v.one/vapid-key-generator/

VAPID_SUBJECT.description: contact email for web push. format: mailto:your@email.com

ENCRYPTION_SECRET.description: master key for encrypting stored credentials. use a random 32+ char string
